step.name: Given Open General Bank Demo page
step.title: Given Open General Bank Demo page

step.name: When User makes post message regarding account balance
step.title: When User makes post message regarding account balance

step.name: And User initial message regarding account balance with following bot response 'Hi Tom, checking your balance on your phone is easy. You'll need to download and register the General bank app. Then, select save, sign in and voila, you'll be able to see your balances.' in comments are shown
step.title: And User initial message regarding account balance with following bot response 'Hi Tom, checking your balance on your phone is easy. You'll need to download and register the General bank app. Then, select save, sign in and voila, you'll be able to see your balances.' in comments are shown

step.name: When User sends a new post regarding open hours in the same conversation
step.title: When User sends a new post regarding open hours in the same conversation

step.name: And Bot responds with 'Selected branches in major shopping malls are open on Sundays (9am - 1pm or 10am - 2pm). You may visit to check the trading hours of your nearest branch. Use the cellphone banking app to do transactions 24/7. For more information on #TheBestWaytoBank you may visit us' on user additional question regarding open hours
step.title: And Bot responds with 'Selected branches in major shopping malls are open on Sundays (9am - 1pm or 10am - 2pm). You may visit to check the trading hours of your nearest branch. Use the cellphone banking app to do transactions 24/7. For more information on #TheBestWaytoBank you may visit us' on user additional question regarding open hours

label.name: story
label.value: Bot should answer with comment on users's post
